name: Palace Kids Princess Market 2
description:
Welcome to the shopping paradise! Andexplore the supermarket world with many learning activities for kids. Help your customers to shop they want and get ready for fun. This supermarket has many sections. Before open the supermarket, you have to do clean whole market. Then you can perform interesting activities like build discount sale board, collect the fresh food items, fix a trolley in a proper corner, check good's weight and packing makes sure to pay the right amount in cash counter and much more.This supermarket has some animated scene when you active in your shopping items.
Feature :

- Manage all food counters
- Remove rotten food
- Try a yummy and delicious cake
- Beautiful graphics scene
- Maintain supermarket environment
- Scan all goods item and count the price
